title: SocialMediaPosting
description: A post to a social media platform, including blog posts, tweets, Facebook posts, etc.

allOf.description:
An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.

See also blog post.

sharedContent.description: A CreativeWork such as an image, video, or audio clip shared as part of this posting.
